posts.post_content:
As an extreme fan of her influence on Gatherer to utterly redundify half the comments on this entire set, but also as someone that now thinks he might have an understanding and compassion for Doom Blade Guy,  
AND as someone who feels that his fan ravings on a billion other cards repeatedly hyperlinking back to She-Who-Must-Stop-Being-Named might incur some kind of debt to society-  
  
I kinda feel I owe it to Gatherer....  
To point out that [Kaalia of the Vast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kaalia of the Vast) is a human. >.<
